actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to require the Commissioner to publish annually a report regarding projects completed under title IV of such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to require the Commissioner of the Administration on Aging to publish an annual report on completed projects on aging.

titles.title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to require the Commissioner to publish annually a report regarding projects completed under title IV of such Act.
